locations.name: Shanghai
locations.description: A vibrant metropolis known for its futuristic Bund skyline, historic French Concession, and modern art scene.

locations.name: Beijing
locations.description: China's capital, rich in history with iconic sites like the Great Wall, Forbidden City, and Summer Palace.

locations.name: Lijiang
locations.description: Home to a UNESCO-listed Old Town with charming cobblestone streets, canals, and Naxi culture, set against the Jade Dragon Snow Mountain.

locations.name: Yangshuo
locations.description: Famous for its stunning karst mountain landscape along the Li and Yulong Rivers, ideal for river cruises and cycling.

locations.name: Hong Kong
locations.description: A dynamic global city offering iconic skyline views from Victoria Peak, bustling markets, and a unique fusion of cultures.
